title: Flipped Learning-Based Nursing Simulation Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Nursing Terminology and Patient Care Procedures
context.additional_context: Providing practical environments using VR devices, with smartphones as supplementary learning tools

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic nursing skills with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations.
Learners can contribute at least three professional opinions in discussions after analyzing online learning materials.
Learners can collaborate with team members to solve real-life nursing scenarios in PBL (Problem-Based Learning) tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
